title: The Uwe Oeuvre
itunes:title: The Uwe Oeuvre
description:
We're in and out of early access this week with a bunch of new releases including Teardown, Rogue Legacy 2, Mythforce, and The Iron Oath, plus: Blizzard's Diablo Immortal about-face, cars with legs, PlayStation nukes, a comprehensive look at video game movie box office history, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:13) Show Rundown
(00:02:06) Move over Cage it's time for Hawk
(00:14:24) Teardown [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Apr 21, 2022
(00:30:44) First Break
(00:30:48) Rogue Legacy 2 [PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S] on Apr 28, 2022
(00:42:29) The Iron Oath [Mac, PC (Microsoft Windows), Linux] on Apr 19, 2022
(00:53:13) MythForce [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Apr 20, 2022
(01:03:46) Second Break
(01:04:16) PlayStation adding mandatory game trials?
(01:11:10) Diablo Immortal getting a PC version
(01:15:45) Sega pulling some Sonic games down?
(01:19:21) Ubisoft ending online services in a number of games
(01:27:44) Metal Gear designer wants to make a car
(01:30:04) This is Miyamoto (our movie is delayed)
(01:32:05) The Sonic 2 movie has done quite well
(01:33:59) Alex's Video Game Movie Quiz
(02:10:51) Wrapping up and thanks
(02:11:54) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(02:13:22) Nextlander content updates
(02:14:29) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
